A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the most fun I've had watching a Star Wars film since 1983. I love being surprised at the movies and I got exactly that. I was not prepared for what I saw at all and I think that is why I enjoyed it so much. Saw it 3 nights running and can't wait to see it again. Rian Johnson has blown a breathe of fresh air into the franchise. Hamills performance of a broken man was nothing short of amazing. Absolutely loved the humour too. Bravo.
